opinion.case_name: English v. Board of Education of the Town of Boonton

opinion:
537 U.S. 1148

ENGLISH ET AL.
v.
BOARD OF EDUCATION OF THE TOWN OF BOONTON ET AL.

No. 02-680.

Supreme Court of United States.

January 13, 2003.

1

CERTIORARI TO THE UNITED STATES COURT OF APPEALS FOR THE THIRD CIRCUIT.

2

C. A. 3d Cir. Motion of petitioners to defer consideration of petition for writ of certiorari denied. Certiorari denied. Reported below: 301 F. 3d 69.
